text:
Message 1573 of 4024
In discussing with him he doesn’t think practice tonight is a good idea. His leg is hurt from a kid pushing him against a table.
Sent:02/23/2024 at 03:42 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/23/2024 at 03:42 PM)
Subject:Re: On Platform
Message 1574 of 4024
Ok. Thanks! Appreciate the update. I trust you.
Feel free to include me in decisions so you don’t have to be the gatekeeper for “Adrian access” now that we have a plan again. I’m more than happy to
engage like I’m actually his dad. I would have offered him to come play NCAA for a couple hours since it was his Xmas gift and he has not had it for
six weeks.
Sent:02/23/2024 at 03:46 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/23/2024 at 04:07 PM)
Subject:Re: On Platform
Message 1575 of 4024
Please make sure you get it on Adrian‘s knee as quickly as possible. If he is not able to come to practice, he should have that iced to prevent further
swelling and irritation that will limit the time to heal.
I am more than happy to sit and explain to you when you use heat and when you use cold to help get you better in the case of soft tissue issues.
Treating it properly as soon as possible makes a big difference.
Sent:02/23/2024 at 04:53 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Ice

my head.  I would like to constructively work with you now your criteria for an updated parenting plan have been met.
